# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Threads, Distributed

function pig_latinify(word::string)
    vowels = "aeiouAEIOU"
    if in(word[1], vowels)
        word*="way"
    else
        start = findfirst(c -> in(c, vowels), word)
        word = word[start:end]*word[1:start-1]*"ay"
    end
    word
end

function threaded_pig_latinify(words::Vector{string})
    pool = ThreadPool()
    addtask(pool, pig_latinify; words[i] for i in 1:length(words))
    results = collect(pool)
    return results
end
```
